#include <iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string set;
    cin>>set;
    while(set!= "TheEnd")
    {
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        vector<string> b;
        vector<int> table;
        b.resize(n);
        vector < vector <int> > p;
        vector<int> final,count;
        p.resize(n);
        b.resize(n);
        final.resize(m);
        table.resize(m);
        table.push_back(-100);
        count.resize(m,1);
        int res=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            p[i].resize(m+1,0);
            
            cin>>b[i];
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
            {
                cin>>p[i][j];                
            }
        }
        for(int j=m-1;j>=0;j--)
        {
            int best = p[0][j] + table[j+1] - p[0][j+1] +100;
            
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                for(int k=j+1;k<=m;k++)
                {
                    if(best >= p[i][j] - p[i][k] + 100 + table[k])
                    {
                        best = p[i][j] - p[i][k] + 100 + table[k];
                        count[j] = k-j;
                        final[j] = i;
                    }
                }
            }
            table[j] = best;
        }
        
        cout<<set<<endl;
        final.push_back(-1);
        cout<<"Tk "<<table[0]<<endl;
        for(int i=0;i<m;)
        {
            
            cout<< b[final[i]]<<" for "<<count[i]<<" month(s)"<<endl;
            i +=count[i];
        }
        cout<<endl;
        cin>>set;
    }
    cout<<"TheEnd"<<endl;
   return 0;
}
